original_text: The other things that happened while Jehu was king are written in a book. The book is called ‘The history of Israel's kings’. It tells about all the great things that Jehu did.
korean_text: 예후의 남은 사적과 행한 모든 일과 업적은 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: The other things that happened while Jehu was king
sentences.korean_translation: 여호가 왕이었을 때 일어난 다른 일들은

sentences.original_text: The book is called 'The history of Israel's kings'
It tells about all the great things
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 모든 위대한 일들에 대해 말합니다
여호가 한 모든 위대한 일들에 대해 말합니다
